Equivariant Manifold Flows Isay Katsman, Aaron Lou, Derek Lim, Qingxuan Jiang, Ser-Nam Lim, Christopher De Sa ICML INNF Workshop (2021) [pdf] New Benchmarks for Learning on Non-Homophilous Graphs Derek Lim*, Xiuyu Li*, Felix Hohne*, Ser-Nam Lim Workshop on Graph Learning Benchmarks (GLB 2021) at WWW (2021) [arXiv] [pdf] [data/code] Doubly Stochastic Subspace Clustering

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Derek Lim, a first-year PhD student at MIT EECS. I did my undergrad in Math and Computer Science at Cornell University. My contact information can be found here. Events December 2020: Received an honorable mention for the CRA Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher Award. June 2021: At ICWSM 2021 we presented our paper on expertise and dynamics on Genius. December 2020: At NeurIPS 2020 we presented our paper on Neural Manifold Ordinary Differential Equations September 21, 2020: My interview with the Data Skeptic podcast is now on Spotify.

item.title: Other Stuff
item.description: Teaching Materials AI for Social Networks Presentation at Inspirit AI Summer Scholars 2021 [Slides] Social Media and Data Science class at Rainstorm 2021 [Slides] Cornell Undergrad Notes This is a compilation of notes in \(\LaTeX\) for some of the courses that I have taken at Cornell. These notes are taken in class so they tend not to include drawings and may be messy at points; the blame should fall on me—not the instructors—for any issues in the notes.
Contact I can be reached by email at dereklim(at)mit[dot]edu.
